item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, March 2, 2025 at 4:20 PM UTC
item.description:
1. GPT-4.5: "Not a frontier model"? (27 points | 19 comments)
2. Raspberry Pi Pico audio player (24 points | 5 comments)
3. Show HN: I built a modern Goodreads alternative (67 points | 63 comments)
4. Google does not want rights to things you do using Chrome (2008) (23 points | 5 comments)
5. I struggled with Git, so I'm making a game to spare others the pain (14 points | 11 comments)
6. The early days of Linux (2023) (376 points | 100 comments)
7. Louis Rossmann opines on the Firefox debacle [video] (35 points | 14 comments)
8. The most unhinged video wall, made out of Chromebooks (507 points | 52 comments)
9. ‘Slime’ keeps the brain safe ― and could guard against ageing (117 points | 40 comments)
10. Mark Cuban offers to fund former 18f employees (209 points | 186 comments)
11. Trust in Firefox and Mozilla Is Gone – Let's Talk Alternatives (109 points | 68 comments)
12. How Flash games shaped the video game industry (2020) (197 points | 116 comments)
13. A few words about indie app business (21 points | 5 comments)
14. The three-dimensional Kakeya conjecture, after Wang and Zahl (34 points | 1 comment)
15. Knowing CSS is mastery to Front end Development (103 points | 110 comments)
16. Show HN: SafeHaven – A Minimal VPN Implementation in Go (8 points | 1 comment)
17. Show HN: Berlin Swapfest – Electronics flea market (278 points | 57 comments)
18. Free introns of tRNAs as complementarity-dependent regulators of gene expression (22 points | 4 comments)
19. Crossing the uncanny valley of conversational voice (320 points | 169 comments)
20. The A.I. Monarchy (141 points | 145 comments)
21. Firefly Blue Ghost Mission 1 Lunar Landing (154 points | 32 comments)
22. Euclid finds complete Einstein Ring in NGC galaxy (145 points | 37 comments)
23. Show HN: Robyn – “Batman Inspired” Python Web Framework Built with Rust (62 points | 44 comments)
24. Show HN: I made a website where you can create your own "Life in Weeks" timeline (219 points | 60 comments)
25. A cross-platform multi-target dotfiles manager written in Rust (69 points | 57 comments)
26. AlgoMIDI – A Mathematical 'Music Studio' (60 points | 7 comments)
27. I'm a neuroscientist. Here's the surprising truth about TikTok 'brain rot' (9 points | 9 comments)
28. Passing the Buck: The story of the 2022 Wings Over Dallas air show collision (71 points | 14 comments)
29. Mozilla flamed by Firefox fans after reneging on promises to not sell their data (226 points | 142 comments)
30. Reimagining Fluid Typography (56 points | 18 comments)
